Torrent includes both x86 and x64 ISOs, at about 600MB and 1GB respectively. I've only tested the 64-bit version, which works great, with the following caveats:

1) "Turn Windows features on or off" in the Programs and Features control panel doesn't work, because the system is missing C:\Windows\system32\OptionalFeatures.exe. That means you can't remove IE8, games, XPS support, etc. etc.

2) Base system is in Spanish. Language packs are available through Windows Update, but startup/shutdown banners will always read "Iniciando/Apagando equipo"

3) Base system takes up about 10GB on my 16GB SSD. It's certainly less than the 16GB the full install took, but still not exactly a lite OS.

4) Does not include Windows Activation.

I will be looking for another edition solely because of point #3; if I find something suitable, I will post here again.

Pero gracias webchella, en todos otros respectos, si sirve muy bien.
I wish it was in english!
